meta.title: From IMPROVISATIONAL to PROMPT
meta.author: Sandy Weisz and Mao Reynolds
meta.message: This week's Raddles are in honor of the upcoming season of "[Make Some Noise](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tKBcWn-tqWE)," which premieres on Monday, October 13. It's a regular Monday night ritual in our house and one of the best things on the internet. Each show features three improvisers, one host, and a set of bonkers improvisational prompts. "Make Some Noise" is available with a subscription to [Dropout](https://signup.dropout.tv/), which is well worth it.

ladder.clue: Credit card at the center of <>
Move the last letter of <> to the front to get a car rental company
Add a letter to the start of <> to the name of a Cup
Move the last letter of <> to the front to get an expression
Change one letter in <> to get some headwear
Event where a teenager becomes a <>
Move the first letter of <> to the end to get a fun time
Add a letter to the start of <> and another to the end to be on time
